alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 7:59AM AKST until February 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Cold winds chills to 50 below and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility one half mile or less at times. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. North winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...The Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds gusting to 40 mph are causing areas of blowing and drifting snow with low visibility and wind chills to 50 below. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
